segments.text: What sports do you think women excel at most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think women excel in every sport except the ones that are taboo for us to join in , like football .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I mean which ones are they better at than men ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you care ? Women and men are different all around . I don't think they can be compared .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good point . Let me change my question . What sports do women like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I know some women who love golf and I know others who love contact sports .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you saying that women can't be generally categorized ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you suggesting that anyone can be ?
segments.speaker: S2
